name: RunDistributedTests
friendlyName: Run Visual Studio Tests using Test Agent
description: Run tests distributedly using multiple test agents in a lab environment.
author: Microsoft Corporation

inputs.name: environment
inputs.label: Test Environment
inputs.helpMarkDown: The name of the environment on which tests need to be run.

inputs.name: alternateCredsUserName
inputs.label: Alternate credentials Username
inputs.helpMarkDown: Alternate credentials Username for connecting to TFS

inputs.name: alternateCredsPassword
inputs.label: Alternate credentials Password
inputs.helpMarkDown: Alternate credentials Password for connecting to TFS

inputs.name: sourcefilters
inputs.label: Test Assembly
inputs.helpMarkDown: Test binaries to run tests on.  Wildcards can be used.  For example, `**\*test*.dll;` for all dlls with test in name.

inputs.name: runSettingsFile
inputs.label: Run Settings File
inputs.helpMarkDown: the runsettings or testsettings file for the test run

inputs.name: overrideRunParams
inputs.label: Override TestRun Parameters
inputs.helpMarkDown: Override parameters defined in the TestRunParameters section of runsettings file. For example: Platform=$(platform) Port=`8080`
